title: Unidentified gunman shoots dead 42 year old in Beliatta
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); A 42-year-old man was shot dead by an unidentified person at a house in the Nihiluwa, Beliatta.
The police say that the murderer had arrived on a motorbike.
The cause for the murder is yet to be ascertained, while the deceased has been identified as a resident of Beliatta area.
